original_text:
Let all creation rejoice before the Lord, for he comes,
    he comes to judge the earth.
He will judge the world in righteousness
    and the peoples in his faithfulness.
korean_text: 그가 임하시되 땅을 심판하러 임하실 것임이라 그가 의로 세계를 심판하시며 그의 진실하심으로 백성을 심판하시리로다

sentences.original_text: Let all creation rejoice before the Lord
he comes to judge the earth
He will judge the world in righteousness
and the peoples in his faithfulness
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 신실함으로 백성들을 심판하실 것이다
